pull.title: Fix for utiltime to compile with msvc.
pull.body: This PR allows utiltime.cpp to compile with msvc after the changes introduced in #12973.

events.message: Fix for utiltime to compile with msvc.

events.body:
I closed #9566 because I thought it was getting out of hand, but since we're going that way anyway, here's how my attempt at it looked back then:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9566/files#diff-8e9b29a6133dd7bf43643c37c5c4689aR27

utACK abd58a2fcae767e9074c49b64e9c89e5168d7005
I'm just going to merge this, if it fixes the build it shouldn't be open for weeks, can be improved later if necessary.

issue.title: commits from bitcoin/master
issue.body:
[doc] build-windows: Switch to Artful, since Zesty is EOL
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12997

[rpc] Introduced a new `fees` structure that aggregates all sub-field fee types denominated in BTC
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12240

p2wsh and p2sh-p2wsh address in decodescript
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12321

Fix for utiltime to compile with msvc.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13031

qa: Add test for orphan handling
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13003

Do not treat bare multisig outputs as IsMine unless watched
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13002

issue.title: [Util] Time utility updates
issue.body:
This is a backport of a collection of upstream PRs to bring our time utility more up to date. The following upstream PRs are included:

- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10383
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12567
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12973
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13031
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16046
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18162
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18358

The two user-facing notable changes here have been documented in the release notes template. I've also connected the functionality that `-logtimemicros` was supposed to provide.

comments.body: Please factor this out to a function to prevent repetition.
